headline: Broadridge's Shareholder Disclosure Hub Migrates to AWS, Boosting Global Reach, Resilience and Security
summary: Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. (NYSE: BR), a global Fintech leader, today announced a major advancement in its Global Proxy modernization program with the successful migration of its Shareholder Disclosure Hub (SDH) to Amazon Web Services (AWS). This latest milestone enhances the platform's resilience, performance, and security while expanding its global reach, now including the key markets of Singapore and South Africa across the EMEA and APAC regions.
